page.title: 16Holsworthy Wood Part 2
page.content: Holsworthy Wood is managed by the forestry commission.{The forestry {commission}is a body working for the Goverment to look after Britains forests and to produce wood as a commodity. New trees are grown using this method. {FIRST:}The cones are collected. {SECOND:}They are dried in an oven to extract the seeds. {THIRD: }The seed are de-winged. {FOURTH:}They are planted in seed beds and left for 2 years. {FIFTH:}The seedlings are planted out 5 feet apart. {SIXTH:}The young trees are thinned at intervals to allow space for strong growth.
